definition: krone (currency of Norway, Denmark, Iceland and Sweden) (loanword)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Former President George W. Bush called Cronkite "an icon of American journalism."
sentences.chinese: 前总统布什称克朗凯特为“美国新闻业的偶像”。

sentences.english: A change came over Cronshaw's placid round face.
sentences.chinese: 克朗肖的平静的圆脸一下子变了色。

sentences.english: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他回忆克朗肖经常谈起的那个波斯地毯的寓言。

sentences.english: Like, the dollar currency is very low compared to the Swedish crown right now,
sentences.chinese: 跟瑞典克朗相比，现在的美元汇率很低。

sentences.english: The total value of this agreement is some 150 million Norwegian Kronor approx.
sentences.chinese: 这一协议的总价值约1亿5千万挪威克朗。

sentences.english: Back into that awful Klondike world of suffering?
sentences.chinese: 回到可怕的克朗代克的痛苦世界中去？

sentences.english: The Icelandic krona is the official currency of Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛克朗是冰岛的官方货币。

sentences.english: Hai Kelang Packing Co. , Ltd. is on the business.
sentences.chinese: 是上海克朗包装有限公司的企业宗旨。

sentences.english: This time the most conspicuous victim has been the Icelandic krona.
sentences.chinese: 此次危机中最明显的受害者就是冰岛克朗。

sentences.english: What is the exchange rate between the U.S. dollar and the Swedish crown?
sentences.chinese: 美元和瑞典克朗之间的汇率是多少？

sentences.english: 18—Those are halfcrowns, man, Corley corrected him.
sentences.chinese: “是几枚半克朗硬币哩，老兄，”科利纠正他说。

sentences.english: And Walter Cronkite, in measured tones, informed us that yes it was.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特克朗凯特，在测音，告诉我们的是它。

sentences.english: This is popular Klondike-Solitaire! Klondike Soliraire is standard cards game.
sentences.chinese: 克朗代克接龙游戏是标准的牌类游戏。

sentences.english: The default game, Klondike, is being started instead.
sentences.chinese: 将运行默认游戏克朗代克。

sentences.english: There was Walter Cronkite in shirtsleeves, with a microphone in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特克朗凯特在衬衫，在他面前的麦克风。

sentences.english: The smell of decaying meat overpowered Crompton.
sentences.chinese: 腐肉的臭味使克朗普顿受不了。

definition: peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
